newsitem.title: CHINA: China Guotai underwrites most shares in H1 1997.
newsitem.headline: China Guotai underwrites most shares in H1 1997.

text.p: The China Guotai Securities Co was the biggest underwriter among all Chinese brokerages in the first half of 1997, the Shanghai Securities News said on Saturday.

The company underwrote the issue of a total of 899.64 million shares in the first six months of this year and was the lead underwriter for 15 companies in their initial public offerings, the newspaper said.
It was followed by Shenzhen-based J&A Securities Co which underwrote 505 million shares and the Beijing-based CITIC Securities Co with 488.55 million shares, the newspaper said.
